name: re_vibe_ci_ms2
description: *Re:Vibe* is an interactive ear training platform game built with HTML, CSS and JavaScript, for music students of all ages and abilities who would like to improve their ears through the exercises that Re:Vibe provides. Whether the user is taking their first steps into the world of music, or are skilled in reading music and want to improve their ability to play by ear or in an ensemble, Re:Vibe serves as a user friendly, aesthetic platform that musicians enjoy training with time after time.
